EmailTemplate.description: An email is sent to the program notifying that their change of administrator request has been withdrawn
EmailTemplate.name: COA Amendment Request Withdrawn
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Administrator Withdrawn - {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Change of Administrator Request for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} was withdrawn on {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Transaction_Status_Date__c} .Please contact your department representative for further assistance if needed.
To view the details of this request, log into OCLQS. https://oclqs.force.com/oclqs_home Select the “ Licensing Amendment“ tab under My programs , and then click the Amendment Activities” sub tab
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
